description: youtube-sque app with likes and comments functionality

scripts.//: FURTHER IS A COMMENT!  -r dotenv/config: This option tells nodemon to require the dotenv/config module before running the script. The dotenv module is commonly used to load environment variables from a .env file into process.env. --experimental-json-modules: This flag enables experimental support for ECMAScript modules (ESM) in Node.js. It allows the use of import and export syntax in JavaScript files.
